languages.text: If the wearer's ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} дистанционной атакой, персонаж получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} при следующей дистанционной атаке, направленной в ту же цель. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

If the wearer's ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

If the wearer's ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g} des Trägers einen Feind, erhält der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} für den nächsten Fernkampfangriff gegen denselben Feind. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: If the wearer's ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Trifft{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriff des Trägers einen Feind, erhält der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 % auf die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritische Trefferchance{/g} für den nächsten Fernkampfangriff gegen denselben Feind. Addiert sich nicht.

languages.text: Si l'attaque à distance de l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi, un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 % s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} de l'attaque à distance suivante menée par cet utilisateur contre le même ennemi. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: If the wearer's ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Si l'attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} de l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}atteint{/g} un ennemi, un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +5 % s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g} de l'attaque à distance suivante menée par cet utilisateur contre le même ennemi. Non cumulable.

languages.text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，装备者针对同一敌人的下次远程攻击获得5%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，装备者同一敌人的下次远程攻击获得5%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击率{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Si el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo con un ataque a distancia, obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} para los siguientes ataques a distancia que realice contra el mismo enemigo. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: If the wearer's ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo con un ataque a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g}, obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} para los siguientes ataques a distancia que realice contra el mismo enemigo. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、使用者は同じ敵に対する次の遠隔攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット率{/g}に+5％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が付与される。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、使用者は同じ敵に対する次の遠隔攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット率{/g}に+5％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が付与される。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} дистанционной атакой, персонаж получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} при следующей дистанционной атаке, направленной в ту же цель. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: If the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy, the wielder gains +5% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой, персонаж получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}шансу критического попадания{/g} при следующей дистанционной атаке, направленной в ту же цель. Эффект не суммируется.

Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой, персонаж получает +5% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}шансу критического попадания{/g} при следующей дистанционной атаке, направленной в ту же цель. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, menzilli saldırı yaparak bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} aynı düşmana yapacağı bir sonraki menzilli saldırının {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığına{/g} +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır. Etki üst üste birikmez.
